description technical detail:
NEC AccuSync AS241W - 24" LCD Monitor
NEC AccuSync 24" 16:9 Wide LCD with TN TFT Display features green product design using the latest LED backlight technology at an affordable price. The attractively designed display comes also with DVI-D input. It is the ideal monitor for entry-level, corporate and demanding consumers.
